messages.title: STRONG, STABLE LEADERSHIP IN THE NATIONAL INTEREST
messages.content: Or A COALITION OF CHAOS WITH JEREMY CORBYN

messages.title: THINKING OF VOTING LIBERAL DEMOCRAT OR GREEN?
messages.content: It will only help Jeremy Corbyn.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest and central to your own financial security.
Building a stronger economy that rewards people who work hard so they can lead a better and more secure life.
With a strong negotiating hand, I can deliver for you and for Britain.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Thinking of voting Liberal Democrat or Green? It will only help Jeremy Corbyn.

issues.brexitEurope: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest and central to your own financial security.
issues.economy: Building a stronger economy that rewards people who work hard so they can lead a better and more secure life. Provide real opportunity and security for you and your loved ones.
issues.governance: With a strong negotiating hand, I can deliver for you and for Britain.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am standing with Theresa May in the national interest.

politicalExperience.role: Member of Parliament for Chesham & Amersham
politicalExperience.achievements: Protecting and enhancing the environment and helping local businesses to thrive.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Officially endorsed by Prime Minister Theresa May. Warning against a coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn.
